summary: This bill, the Nuclear Ecosystem Drone Defense Act of 2025 (NEDD Act of 2025), primarily focuses on granting the Secretary of Energy exemptions from existing prohibitions related to unmanned aircraft systems (drones). It amends sections of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2024 to include the Secretary of Energy in various provisions regarding procurement, operation, and the use of federal funds for these systems. Additionally, it expands the Secretary's authority regarding the protection of nuclear facilities and assets from unmanned aircraft.
